column1: #Text=Hey , Katara , do n't you think that cloud look like a flower ?
#Text=" Wu says : " Bending arrow cloud ... good crops this year .
#Text=" Wu says : " Wavy , moon - shaped cloud ... let 's see .
#Text=Gon na be a great year for twins !
#Text=" Wu says : " And a cumulus cloud with a twisted nob coming off the end of it ... The village will not be destroyed by the volcano this year !
